view.name: system, basic, detailed, video, grid, gamecarousel

text.name: TextDescLong
text.text: Hacked games for the Nintendo Entertainment System is an 8-bit video game console that was released by Nintendo in North America during 1985, in Europe during 1986 and Australia in 1987.

text.name: TextDescShort
text.text: Hacked games for the Nintendo Entertainment System is an 8-bit video game console that was released by Nintendo.
